document_data.mainbody:
amara Cymrych was High Queen of the Moonshae Isles for a brief time in the mid-to-late 3 century DR.
She was a member of the Cymrych Dynasty and the first daughter of the dynastyâ€™s legendary namesake, Cymrych Hugh. Her mother was his second wife.
She was the sister of both her immediate predecessor, High King Warren I, and of her successor, Carrig I.
Tamara assumed the throne of the High Queen in Callidyrr during the , after the death of her brother, High King Warren I. At the time, Cedric Riker ruled in her familys ancestral seat of Corwell as its regent, and would do so for her entire reign.
She ruled for only four years before dying of poison in the .
